data.name: object to xml - xml #2
data.description:
# object to xml - xml #2
Since you can turn an xml string into an object you have now decided to do the reverse turn an xml object into an xml formatted string.

## task
Your task is to turn an xml object into an xml string, you will be passed an array of xml objects and must return a string representation.

## preloaded
You have been preloaded with a helper, this can be used to display the xml string correctly. To use this helper call ```console.xml({xml string})```

## info
Differences from the previous kata is the xml sub arrays can now contain just strings which is normal text you must apply that text to the xml string in the order of occurence in the array.
